title: Gold Extends Biggest Fall in Over a Decade as Rally Snaps Back
description: Gold fell, extending its biggest plunge in more than a decade, as precious metals snapped back from a record-breaking rally that had run too far, too fast. Silver also slumped.
content: Gold fell, extending its biggest plunge in more than a decade, as precious metals snapped back from a record-breaking rally that had run too far, too fast. Silver also slumped.
